document.full_text: turkish police have detained a group of ultra-nationalists on suspicion that they planned to stir violence at an election rally, media reports said on wednesday, adding to tensions ahead of the june 12 vote.
document.title: turkish nationalists held in pre-poll tension
lines_and_colors: turkish police have detained a group of ultra-nationalists on suspicion that they planned to stir violence at an election rally, media reports said on wednesday, adding to tensions ahead of the june 12 vote.
